    Sneha Mahapatra

    Recieved my BS Degree in Computer Engineering from Purdue University. My interests lie in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering. I aim to build computer vision technology that can help solve day to day problems. I will be completing my masters in Computer Science coming this May
